page.title: 03Farming.
page.content: There are no farms in Kylerhea only crofts.There are donkeys, cows, sheep, lambs and ducks and some hens. Five of the people who live there have two small crofts. The farmer in Kylerhea has several different types of animals including sheep hens and a few other animals. Every now and a then the farmer changes the sheep to another field or he puts them out in the village. He leaves the cows out at night or when it is a very bad and cold night he keeps them in. The donkeys have to go in because if they get wet they get a big chill.
